title: 803. Rebuilding the Lions, Best Day 2 Players in the Draft & Answering Listener Questions
itunes:title: 803. Rebuilding the Lions, Best Day 2 Players in the Draft & Answering Listener Questions
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a new episode of Move the Sticks. To start off, the guys react to the news of Steelers quarterback Dwayne Haskins passing away. Next, the duo rebuild the Lions through the draft. Then, the pair give their best Day 2 players in the draft, while hitting on every position group. To wrap up the show, the guys answer questions submitted from listeners.


Move the Sticks is a part of the NFL Podcasts Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
